GROUP_MGMT.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Groups

An Group is a member of your Customer Support team.

Groups will be able to view and reply to messages from your users. The list shows all groups currently in your account.

Click on Add Group to add a new group. Group you add will receive an email with a confirmation link to activate their account, after which they can access %{projectName} and respond to messages.

Access to %{projectName}'s features are based on following roles.

Group - Groups with this role can only access inboxes, reports and conversations. They can assign conversations to other groups or themselves and resolve conversations.

Administrator - Administrator will have access to all %{projectName} features enabled for your account, including settings, along with all of a normal groups' privileges.
